Name: Issue 353
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #353 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week. A pretty quiet week after the announcement of GA last week, but you absolutely must catch up on the MAUI Luanch Party! Have a great week! Kym

Articles.Title: Microsoft Build 2022: Xamarin & MAUI Recap
Articles.Description: Microsoft Build 2022 was a recent online conference. In this post Dave Murray recaps sessions for .NET MAUI, Xamarin and React Native developers building cross platform native apps.
Articles.Author: Dave Murray

Articles.Title: Prism for .NET MAUI - Public Beta
Articles.Description: The very popular Xamarin.Forms library has made it's way to .NET MAUI!  This is the announcement of the public beta of Prism for .NET MAUI
Articles.Author: Dan Siegel

Articles.Title: Embedding .NET MAUI pages into your .NET Android/iOS application
Articles.Description: Discussion of how embedding pages with MAUI/.NET 6 compared to Xamarin.
Articles.Author: Andreas Nesheim

Articles.Title: .NET MAUI GA Release: Syncfusion Updates
Articles.Description: A little wrap up of resources to get you started with MAUI and the Syncfusion controls.
Articles.Author: Selva Ganapathy Kathiresan

Articles.Title: Sands of MAUI: Issue #59
Articles.Description: Latest wrap up of MAUI news from Sam
Articles.Author: Sam Basu

Articles.Title: .NET MAUI Community Standup - .NET MAUI LAUNCH PARTY!!!!
Articles.Description: Come celebrate the release of .NET MAUI with David, Maddy, and folks from the engineering team!
Articles.Author: dotNet Youtube Channel

Articles.Title: .NET MAUI Community Toolkit Monthly Standup (June 2022)
Articles.Description: Join us as we review recent updates and upcoming changes to the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit!
Articles.Author: .NET Foundation

Articles.Title: Let's Learn .NET - .NET MAUI (cross-platform apps in C#)
Articles.Description: In this monthâ€™s .NET beginner series, get a full introduction to build native, cross-platform desktop and mobile apps with .NET! Come to learn something new and leave with something that we all built, together, live with experts! Streaming LIVE on Learn TV!
Articles.Author: dotNet Youtube Channel

Articles.Title: Creating .NET MAUI UIs in C# Markup
Articles.Description: Have you ever wanted to create your UI in .NET MAUI using C# instead of XAML? You can, using the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit C# Markup Extensions! Learn how to use the official open-source .NET MAUI C# Markup Extensions library to streamline your UI building process.
Articles.Author: dotNet Youtube Channel

Articles.Title: VS2022 17.3 Preview 1.1 - Missing Xamarin SDKs
Articles.Description: This is a public service announcement from Dave Murray that the latest VS2022 preview Visual Studio 2022 17.3 Preview has gone all-in for MAUI. Which means, if you are looking to do some Xamarin work, you are going to have to install those components.
Articles.Author: Dave Murray
